downloadDescription: Integration between PerformancePoint Services and PowerPivot for Excel

downloadFile.name: PerformancePoint Services and PowerPivot for Excel.docx

detailsSection: This document covers the basics of integration between PerformancePoint Services in Microsoft SharePoint Server 2010 and Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2 PowerPivot. It describes the basics of using a PowerPivot model in PerformancePoint and expands on the issues one should expect in using the two products in conjunction with one another.
detailsSection_file_name: PerformancePoint Services and PowerPivot for Excel.docx
systemRequirementsSection: To download and read this paper, you must have Microsoft Office Word 2007. You can also use Office Word 2003 or Word XP and the Microsoft Office Compatibility Pack.
installInstructionSection: Click Download, and then save the file to your computer. Open the file in Word to read and print it.
